name: Motorcycle Driver
description:
This game is created for job application.

In the given assignment these details were asked:

There will be a curved road.

The motorcycle will move in this road.

There is e a red obstacle when player crash this red obstacle the player will be knockback and speed of player become 0.

The curves will be handled by the game. No need to user turn for the curve.

Motorcycle needs to lean when turning or moving left/  right.

The camera should follow the player.

No AI or other Drivers.
